mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party(partyCode, subject, content, startDate, endDate, userIdx, max, enabled, confirmCode) VALUES(PARTY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{userIdx}, #{max}, #{enabled}, #{confirmCode})
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM party p JOIN tb_user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx
AND (enabled = 0)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT partyCode, subject, content, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, p.userIdx, u.roleCode, u.userId, u.userName, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, max, enabled, confirmCode FROM party p JOIN tb_user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx WHERE (enabled = 0) ORDER BY partyCode DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ) WHERE rnum >= 1

SELECT p.partyCode, subject, content, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, p.userIdx, u.roleCode, u.userId, u.userName, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, max, enabled, confirmCode, NVL(partyPeopleCount, 0) partyPeopleCount FROM party p JOIN tb_user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT partyCode, COUNT(*) partyPeopleCount FROM partyPeople GROUP BY partyCode ) pp ON p.partyCode = pp.partyCode WHERE p.partyCode = #{partyCode} AND (enabled = 0)

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT partyCode, subject FROM party p JOIN tb_user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx
AND (partyCode > #{partyCode}) AND (enabled = 0)
ORDER BY created ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT partyCode, subject FROM party p JOIN tb_user u ON p.userIdx = u.userIdx
AND (partyCode < #{partyCode}) AND (enabled = 0)
ORDER BY created DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO partypeople(userIdx, pCode, partyCode, memo) VALUES(#{userIdx}, 0, #{partyCode}, #{memo})
